SELECT id AS rentalId, title, user_id AS userId, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, cost, ST_X(location) AS longitude, ST_Y(location) AS latitude FROM rental r
, gear g
WHERE ST_Within(r.location, ST_GeomFromText(#{polygon})) AND r.status = 'status1'
AND r.id = g.rental_id AND g.type=#{rental.typeId}
